question: Brian went camping as a young boy and greatly enjoyed the outdoors as a teenager. _______, he works as an adventure guide in the outback in Australia.
_______, his favorite show as a child was 'Where in the World is Carmen San Diego?'
_______, Juan visited Mexico and during that trip he learned some Spanish.
______ to his last traveling adventure, this vacation is much more demanding
______, Pedro thought he would travel only through India, but he later decided to visit the Great Wall in China as well'
_______, once he accrues more vacation time, he plans to travel through South America
